row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 13)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 7)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 11)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
col_desc: Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
Queen has one mini challenge win.
Queen returned to the competition during any season.
